column4: i have Feisty installed and Dapper, along with windows XP...i have no need for dapper anymore...so can i just delete the dapper partition and leave it like that, or will i still need to mess with the MBR?
you will need to mess with the mbr. fixmbr in a windows recovery console for example
i select the dapper partition and go to Partition->Format To->ext3, and then it will error me telling me that it can not do it
do you run gparted as root?
i believe so...it asked me for admin pass
is the dapper partition still mounted?
then what else does the error say except it cannot do it?
it show's the filesystem to be unknown...now i can't format or delete it...
use and fdisk program, delete the partition. recreate it, format it
i have the dapper partition formatted now...how do i merge it into feisty's?
